Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

The owner of target artifact or enchantment shuffles it into their library.
Valiant Charge deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. It deals 4 damage instead if you controlled a creature with a counter on it as you cast this spell.

Vigilance

When Pristine Unicorn enters, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

Target creature gains hexproof until end of turn and can’t be blocked this turn.

Scry 1.
Draw a card.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1}{U}.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. If the additional cost was paid, counter that spell instead.
Tap target creature you don’t control and put two stun counters on it. Create a Scion token. [i](It’s a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature with “Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.”)[/i]

Flash

Death’s Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

{1}{C}: Put a level counter on Zhulia Sycophant.
As long as Zhulia Sycophant has two or more level counters on it, it gets +2/+1.
When you put the fifth level counter on Zhulia Sycophant, remove all counters from it and turn it face down. It becomes a 7/7 Eldrazi with “Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.”

Hellcarver Consoler gets +2/+2 and has flying as long as you control a Demon.
Whenever Hellcarver Consoler deals combat damage to a player, put a level counter on it. Then if it has three or more level counters on it, you may search your library for a Demon card, reveal it, put that card in your hand, then shuffle.
